results.title: Skeletal effects of plyometric exercise and metformin in ovariectomized rats.
results.text_hl: To explore whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can improve musculoskeletal training response during @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@, we investigated the skeletal effects of plyometric exercise and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, in an ovarectomized (OVX) @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Stunes AK, Erben RG, Schüler C, Eriksen EF, Tice M, Vashishth D, Syversen U, Mosti MP. Skeletal effects of plyometric exercise and metformin in ovariectomized rats. Bone. 2020 Mar;132():115193. PMID: 31857252
citations.BibTeX: @article{31857252, title={Skeletal effects of plyometric exercise and metformin in ovariectomized rats.}, author={Stunes AK and Erben RG and Schüler C and Eriksen EF and Tice M and Vashishth D and Syversen U and Mosti MP}, journal={Bone}, volume={132}, pages={115193}}

results.title: Combination of metformin and exercise alleviates osteoarthritis in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To evaluate and compare the effects of the combined intervention of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and exercise on the @DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@degeneration of cartilage and@@@ subchondral bone in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@) induced by @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@ and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.

citations.NLM: Li H, Gou Y, Tian F, Zhang Y, Lian Q, Hu Y, Zhang L. Combination of metformin and exercise alleviates osteoarthritis in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet. Bone. 2022 Apr;157():116323. PMID: 34990878
citations.BibTeX: @article{34990878, title={Combination of metformin and exercise alleviates osteoarthritis in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.}, author={Li H and Gou Y and Tian F and Zhang Y and Lian Q and Hu Y and Zhang L}, journal={Bone}, volume={157}, pages={116323}}

results.title: Are Fish Populations at Risk? Metformin Disrupts Zebrafish Development and Reproductive Processes at Chronic Environmentally Relevant Concentrations.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ parental exposure impacted critical molecular processes involved in the metabolism of @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ males, which in turn affected @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroid hormone@@@ biosynthesis and upregulated male @GENE_VTG1 @GENE_559475 @@@vtg1@@@ expression by 99.78- to 155.47-fold at 390 and 14 432 @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ treatment, respectively, pointing to an @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogenic@@@ effect.

citations.NLM: Barros S, Alves N, Pinheiro M, Ribeiro M, Morais H, Montes R, Rodil R, Quintana JB, Coimbra AM, Santos MM, Neuparth T. Are Fish Populations at Risk? Metformin Disrupts Zebrafish Development and Reproductive Processes at Chronic Environmentally Relevant Concentrations. Environ Sci Technol. 2023 Jan 17;57(2):1049-1059. PMID: 36580485
citations.BibTeX: @article{36580485, title={Are Fish Populations at Risk? Metformin Disrupts Zebrafish Development and Reproductive Processes at Chronic Environmentally Relevant Concentrations.}, author={Barros S and Alves N and Pinheiro M and Ribeiro M and Morais H and Montes R and Rodil R and Quintana JB and Coimbra AM and Santos MM and Neuparth T}, journal={Environ Sci Technol}, volume={57}, number={2}, pages={1049-1059}}

results.title: Anti-cancer effect of metformin by suppressing signaling pathway of HER2 and HER3 in tamoxifen-resistant breast cancer cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited activation of @GENE_ERBB2 @GENE_2064 @@@HER2@@@ (Tyr1248)/@GENE_ERBB3 @GENE_2065 @@@HER3@@@ (Tyr1289)/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@Akt@@@ (Ser473) as well as cell proliferation and colony formation by @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogenic@@@ promotion in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0031 @@@MCF-7@@@ and TR @CELLLINE_CVCL:0031 @@@MCF-7@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Kim J, Lee J, Kim C, Choi J, Kim A. Anti-cancer effect of metformin by suppressing signaling pathway of HER2 and HER3 in tamoxifen-resistant breast cancer cells. Tumour Biol. 2016 May;37(5):5811-9. PMID: 26581908
citations.BibTeX: @article{26581908, title={Anti-cancer effect of metformin by suppressing signaling pathway of HER2 and HER3 in tamoxifen-resistant breast cancer cells.}, author={Kim J and Lee J and Kim C and Choi J and Kim A}, journal={Tumour Biol}, volume={37}, number={5}, pages={5811-9}}
